snippet: Four basketball players from Hofstra were arrested and charged with counts of burglary after equipment, including laptops, was reported missing from six dormitory rooms.
abstract: Hofstra men's basketball players Shaquille Stokes, Jimmy Hall, Kentrell Washington and Dallas Anglin are arrested and charged with multiple counts of burglary after many items are reported missing from campus dormitory rooms; players plead not guilty at their arraignment, and are released from police custody on bail.
lead_paragraph: Four basketball players from Hofstra were arrested and charged with counts of burglary after equipment, including laptops, was reported missing from six dormitory rooms.

headline.seo: Four Hofstra Players Charged With Burglary After String of Thefts
headline.main: Four Hofstra Players Charged With Burglary After String of Thefts
headline.print_headline: Four Hofstra Players Charged With Burglary After String of Thefts
